Package assignment.test.util

Class UIHandler

java.lang.Object
assignment.test.util.UIHandler
public class UIHandler extends Object
This class is intended to manage the user input dialog.

    • getInput

      public static void getInput(edu.ccri.assignment.planets.test.dialog.PlanetaryDialog dialog)
      Gets user input from a multi-edit dialog for a trip from a source planet to a destination planet using a transportation vehicle.
      Parameters:

    • addTripToItinerary

      public static void addTripToItinerary(edu.ccri.assignment.planets.test.dialog.PlanetaryDialog dialog)
      Adds a trip to the itinerary, given the user input provided in the dialog. The trip is created by converting the input to objects and performing calculations, then added to the list of trips.
      Parameters:
      dialog - the PlanetaryDialog object containing the user input

    • addTripToItinerary

      public static void addTripToItinerary(String startingPlanetName, String destinationPlanetName, String vehicleName)
      Adds a trip to the itinerary, given the user input provided. The trip is created by converting the input to objects and performing calculations, then it's added to the list of trips.
      Parameters:
      startingPlanetName - the name of the starting planet
      destinationPlanetName - the name of the destination planet
      vehicleName - the name of the transportation vehicle
